definition: دخن dakina a to be smoky; to taste or smell of smoke; -- dakina a u to smoke, emit smoke (fire) II to fumigate, fume (هـ s.th.); to smoke, cure with smoke (هـ foodstuffs); to smoke (هـ a cigarette, tobacco, a pipe) IV to smoke, emit smoke (tire) V to be smoked, be cured with smoke; to be fumigated دخن dukn pearl millet, dukhn دخن dakan smoke, fume, vapor دخن madkana pl. مداخن madākin2 chimney, smokestack, funnel
